item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2014/10/we-are-lions-2/#comment-108086">lucy lau</a>.
That is true, but he doesn't quite have as stirring of a speech as Achilles. This was so good I realized I posted the same video twice over the years.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to lucy lau.

That is true, but he doesn’t quite have as stirring of a speech as Achilles. This was so good I realized I posted the same video twice over the years.

item.title: By: lucy lau
item.dc:creator: lucy lau
item.description: i love all batle scenes on troy, but i prefer hector than achilles as my hero. he's strong character make me feel that he's deserve equally greatness on our history
item.content:encoded: i love all batle scenes on troy, but i prefer hector than achilles as my hero. he’s strong character make me feel that he’s deserve equally greatness on our history
